name: Sabrina
description:
Synopsis ( English )

You are an alcoholic man who is wasting his time in front of a television before going to sleep.

You hear strange sounds coming from the kitchen, and you go to investigate the source.

15 - 30 Minutes Gameplay

Buttons

Arrows                =>             Walk

Z                             =>              Interact - Decide

X                             =>              Cancel - Back

F4                           =>              Maximize the window game

ESC                        =>              Hold to close the game

Credits: Felipe Falcon, Hudell, Graphics POP! Horror City, Enterbrain e Patrick Arteaga by MC Music Pack. Others are in the game.
